text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Let's see, recyclable trash for tomorrow…… which magazines was I gonna throw away? This one, and I'll keep the hot spring one…… and this one――

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ――A college pamphlet, huh?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: This one…… I guess…… I'll hold on to it for now.
Hishi Miracle's training for the Selection Race was proceeding smoothly.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Alright, finished stretching. And then, I'll take it easy today too――

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: That surprised me…… Ahh～, I see. Top Road-chan is gonna run, huh?
A girl that debuted slightly before, and was popular inside and outside of the academy. A rising star of the next gen, Narita Top Road, was on the course.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Yep～, she's so cool today too! We're on different levels, huh～? We're the same grade so sometimes we talk, but it's like she's from another world.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: I do～. After all, Top Road-chan's fans all expect her to 『Win in the Twinkle Series』, don't they?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Don't you think that's a really amazing thing? Besides, debuts aren't an automatic thing, you know?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: There are girls that go to more rural areas, and girls who go in to higher education. Actually, that's probably what most people do――

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Of course, even me, and the other girls with me…… how should I put it――

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: 『Can I even handle a race?』 rather than…… 『Can I win?』. That's what we're more worried about.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: That's why, girls like Top Road-chan…… Kris S-chan and Gimlet-chan. Girls whose goals are 『To Win』――

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……it's like, they seem like people from a different world from us～…… That's how it feels to us.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……and that's why I haven't even debuted up until now～. Ding, ding♪
『If she doesn't win a Selection Race, there won't be a contract』…… that was the condition she proposed, so her debut could be a fresh start.
I could understand her trepidation in stepping in to the post-debut world. However, the Uma Musume named Hishi Miracle――
When I told her 『You can win』, she definitely seemed to be happy.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Excuse me, something urgent came up so the person I was going to do pace training with couldn't make it…… Is there anyone that will run with me?

text_block_list.name: Cheerful Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: So pace training with Top Road-chan……? I-it's a good chance to run with someone strong. Why don't you go?

text_block_list.name: Cynical Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: No, no way no way no way! She's already won several major races, you know!? Running with people who haven't debuted like us won't even be a challenge……!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: I wonder who Top Road-chan's going to run with, huh～?
It was clear that she thought she wouldn't be lining up down there, that's the kind of girl Hishi Miracle was.
choice_data_list: Excuse me!! She'll run with you!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……Eh?
Now that I knew about her efforts, and her worries―― It had felt a little unsatisfying.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Mirako-chan, thanks a lot! It's been a while since we've run together, hasn't it?!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ah, ahaha. I might be lacking in strength, but looking forward to it～……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Wait a minute, Trainer-san……! Why are you making me do something that'll be super embarrassing……!?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: W-what's your basis for that……!?
choice_data_list: You're both in the same world
You're both in the same world

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……There's no way that's true, right～……?
I want Hishi Miracle to realize her own strength. But, if she doesn't get good results here, things won't progress.
In order to decrease the time it took her to get her engine going, I had a secret plan. With this, for sure――!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Huuuuh……!? B-but I just started running though～!?
choice_data_list: Go! Do your best! You can do it!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (No way, no way, increasing my pace now would just lead to me being exhausted and being the punchline……)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (No, it's impossible……)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (That's embarrassing……)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: You-…… you're going that far～……!?
The secret plan…… that's right. It was to heap praise on top of her. And, in short――

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Haaa, haaa……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (A-again……!?)
choice_data_list: Hishi Miracle, you can do it!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (Aw～ geez, guess I don't have a choice～……!!)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (Huh, it's going surprisingly well…… no wait, that can't be right～!)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Haaa…… Haaa…… huh……? It was kind of…… a close match……?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Good work out there, it was good training, wasn't it!? Like I thought, Mirako-chan is strong!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Wha-…… ah, no～, I'm not sure about that……

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: But you are! Really, it was good training. I'm looking forward to next time too!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
choice_data_list: That's right! Hishi Miracle is strong!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Wha- you scared me!? ……No way～…… Today I just happened to get swept up in your plan, I don't think next time will go so well……
Hishi Miracle was being humble…… but it was thanks to her own strength that she had gotten this far.
choice_data_list: It was 『The results of your efforts』

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: But, it's not like I was working all that hard though……
choice_data_list: That's not true! You worked hard!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: You really think so……? Ah～! No～ look～ you're doing it again～!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: In the training just now too, Trainer-san was being so persistent that it motivated me. Without that much motivation――
choice_data_list: Then I'll do it every time!
Then I'll do it every time!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Eeeeh～……? But, I'm not the kind of Uma Musume who should be receiving that――
I shook my head. At least, to me, in the Twinkle Series――

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……Mmmmmm.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……I see. ……so you really think that, huh?
